name: Astral Weapon
text: You become a literal weapon for your god, imbued with an extra dose of divine power emanating from the Astral Sea. As an astral weapon, there are no enemies you won’t oppose, no challenge you won’t take on, for your faith is strong and your weapon sings with power from on high. When you accept this path, the weapon you wield forevermore glows with the silvery light of the Astral Sea.

features.astralJudgment(11thLevel): Enemies currently marked by you that attack your allies without attacking you take a -2 penalty to all defenses until they are no longer marked by you
features.astralRejuvenationAction(11thLevel): You can spend an action point to regain one paladin encounter power you have already used, instead of taking an extra action
features.courageFromOnHigh(16thLevel): You gain a +2 bonus to saving throws against fear effects

flavorText: With the power of the Astral Sea flowing through me, and my faith as powerful as a weapon, I fight as my god wills.
